title: [Plateau, Abandoned Road]
description: A rocky spur of Zeltoph Mountain reaches down from the north, forcing the road tight against the stream's bank.  Beyond the spur the road turns northeast, where strangely symmetrical formations are just visible above the intervening ridge.

A rocky spur of Zeltoph Mountain reaches down from the north, forcing the road tight against the bright stream's bank.  Beyond the spur the road turns northeast, where strangely symmetrical formations are just visible above the intervening ridge.
